item.title: This is the end of Drupal.
item.description:
This is the end of Drupal. To be more precise, this is not the end of Drupal but Drupal Camp 2017.
Yes, the title is clickbait :)
Drupal is just getting started. It is possible thanks to the revolutionary changes that were introduced with version 8, but that's a different story. Here, we would like to sum up the conference.

item.title: DrupalCamp 2017 - starts on Saturday!
item.description:
This Saturday, starting at 8.30 a.m., we will be accepting first visitors to the DrupalCamp Wroclaw conference. Participant registration will start 30 minutes before the first presentation. We have prepared a limited number of t-shirts and other gadgets for those who show up first.
As every year presentations will be recorded, however a live stream will not be available. Videos will be published a few weeks after the conference.

item.title: Voting complete.
item.description: We finished the voting yesterday. The chosen lectures will be delivered during this year's DrupalCamp. We are glad that so many people are interested in it. Now we know what kind of topics draw your attention.

item.title: New venue for the conference.
item.description: This year the conference will take place at Hotel Campanile Wrocław Centrum placed at ul. Ślężna 26 in Wrocław, more details here: If you need more information about the hotel, you can find it here: http://www.campanile-wroclaw-centrum.pl/pl

item.title: 45 days until the conference.
item.description: There are 45 days left until the conference. In a few weeks we have collected 11 propositions for lectures. Among them, there are lectures about object-oriented programming in Drupalu 8, some about Behat, as well as Elastic search, and Docker. There is a full list of the propositions on the website Proposed Sessions. You can send your propositions for lectures until 30 April 2017.

item.title: Drupalcamp Wrocław 2017 - Registration, lectures, support
item.description: Another sixth edition of DrupalCamp conference is coming. It will take place on 27-28 May in Wrocław. The venue for the meeting will be Campanile Wrocław Centrum next to Ślężna Square (the number of the building is 26).

item.title: DRUPALCAMP 2017
item.description: The next edition of the conference will be held on 27-28.05.2017. At the beginning of 2017 years we run a new website for the conference and it will inform about the details.
